column5: My place is close to relaxing in the sun, soaking in the sea, or just lounging and unwinding!!    Youâ€™ll love the Sun, beach, and sand fun! Fishing pier near by, just walking distance to restaurants, the Museum, and the USS Lexington Ship. Texas State Aquarium, and Downtown Corpus Christi are just minutes away!    . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).  Sea'Esta Star is cozy, and modern, and Welcomes you to stay a while!!
